title: Hot Ube Pandesal (Filipino Purple Yam Bread Rolls)

Ingredients.6: 1 (4 ounce) packet purple yam powder, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 0.5 cup unseasoned bread crumbs, or as needed

Directions.1: Pour milk into a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave until warm, about 1 minute.

Directions.2: Place butter in a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave until melted, about 30 seconds.

Directions.3: Place eggs in a bowl; cover with warm water for 1 minute. Drain and crack into a bowl; beat lightly with a fork.

Directions.4: Place warm milk, melted butter, beaten eggs, salt, bread flour, purple yam powder, and bread machine yeast into a bread machine in the order listed. Run Dough cycle.

Directions.5: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.6: Transfer dough to a greased bowl. Deflate dough with your fist. Cut into 24 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a ball.

Directions.7: Pour bread crumbs into a shallow plate; roll balls of dough in bread crumbs until coated. Arrange close together, slightly touching, in an ungreased baking pan.

Directions.8: Bake in the preheated oven until tops are golden brown, about 15 minutes.
